short_summary: *** Communication Expert Service to Assist with Current Defence 365 Initiatives... ***
description: ... for sensitive services with a budget of 3.75M CAD, MS office Ace agreement... more advanced projects, though joint offices.
full_summary:
### Communications Consultant RFP Issued by the Department of National Defence
#### Tender Number W3330-24-395

#### Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for a Communications Consultant to provide expertise in developing and evolving Defence 365 (Microsoft 365) initiatives. The selected contractor will have a minimum security level of Protected A and will be required to have a similar security clearance for their resources and document safeguarding.

#### Background

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a Communications Consultant to provide services in support of IT and communications initiatives.

#### Contract Requirements

*   Contract duration: 2 years (February 28, 2024 to March 31, 2026)
*   Estimated Level of Effort (LOE): 240 workdays
*   Contract value: Estimated value of the contract is not specified
*   Security Clearance: Protected A
*   Required expertise:
    *   Communications Consultant
    *   Expertise in developing and evolving Defence 365 initiatives

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada - Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada - Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada - Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)

#### Key Contact Information

*   Contracting Officer: Mr. Steve Perron
*   Email: [DND.ADMIMProcurement-approvisionnementSMAGI.MDN@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DND.ADMIMProcurement-approvisionnementSMAGI.MDN@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 343-598-6483
*   Organization: Department of National Defence

**Requirements for Proposals**

The DND is soliciting proposals from qualified bidders. The deadline for submitting proposals is February 21, 2024, 2:00 pm EST. All submissions must be made in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation
